<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Doctor's Visitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2028) <actions string="Single Action or Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 184 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=69)

**Prerequisites**
[Medic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2027)

</column>

---

You move to provide immediate care to those who need it. Stride, then use one of the following: [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760) or [Treat Poison](/Actions.aspx?ID=56). You can spend a second action to instead Stride and then [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54) or [Treat a Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=2029) (if you have it).
name: Doctor's Visitation
